Hello, My name is Jason Gange, and I'm .net developer. I also have knowledge in using angularjs and javascript for my front-end. I graduated in Pamantasan ng Lungsod ng Marikina year 2017, while studying I work at Jollibee to fullfill my allowance at the same time I also play for my school as varsity player, after I graduated in college my first job in IT industry is technical support. It's been a roller coaster ride for me to become a web developer, I got inspired by cousin's husband Mr. CJ Felix to pursue my dream to become a web developer and now I'm currently working now on Codebizz IT Solutions as fullstack web developer for almost 1 year.
